description:
Present available quality options (1080p, 720p, 480p, etc.) before download starts, allowing users to choose based on file size and quality preferences. Show estimated file sizes for each quality tier.

**Rationale:** Different use cases require different quality levels - users may want 4K for archival but 480p for quick sharing on bandwidth-limited connections. This gives users control over the quality-storage tradeoff.
title: Quality/resolution selection for video downloads

descriptionHistory.description:
